name: spirits mirror::digital possessed
description:
a spirit reflects

the visions you see

shifting divisions

between you & me

we talk in the garden

you tell me your name

you tell me be careful

to not do the same

the spirit descends like a beautiful dove

wrapped in addictions & perils of love

burning for futures obscured in the flames

a mirror reflects, so we play mirror games

suggesting halves

but

neither

_________________________________________________
